Race.SpecificTitle: City Marshal -- City Court, City of Natchitoches
Fire Prot. Dist. No. 3 -- 9.52 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 3 Proposition
(Millage Renewal) 

Summary:  10-Year 9.52 Mill Property Tax Renewal for Fire Protection District No. 3, to be used for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 3 of the Parish of Natchitoches, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of nine and fifty-two hundredths (9.52) mills on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $32,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 8 -- 14 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 8 Proposition
(Millage) 

Summary:  Authority for Fire Protection District No. 8 of the Parish of Natchitoches, State of Louisiana, to levy a 10 year 14-mills tax for the purpose of constructing, acquiring, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, said tax to be in lieu of the similar 8.78 mills tax authorized at a special election held on May 1, 1999.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 8 of the Parish of Natchitoches, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy and collect a special tax of fourteen (14) mills on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $16,900 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of constructing, acquiring, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, said tax to be in lieu of the similar 8.78 mills tax authorized at a special election held on May 1, 1999?
